Package pamvotis.core

Class Summary
MobileNode Simulates a mobile node
Packet Represents a packet.
PacketBuffer Simulates the hardware packet buffer of a noder
Params Contains the parameters of a node, like coverage, position, data rate e.t.c
Simulator This is the basic class of Pamvotis that does all the work.
SourceManager Manages the sources of a node.
SpecParams This class reads the Standard's parameters from the NtConf.xml file and stores them to the static variables.
VirtualPacket Simulates a packet generated from a session.
